name: Quest for Normalcy
description:
Controls for Windows/Web:

  • Start - Enter
  • Select psychological profile option - A or Enter
  • Win the game - Press the buttons displayed on the screen.
  • Return to title screen - Escape
  • Fullscreen (Windows only) - Alt+Enter

Controls for Dreamcast:

  • Start - Start
  • Select psychological profile option - A or Start
  • Win the game - Press the buttons displayed on the screen
  • Return to title screen - A+B+X+Y+Start (Standard Dreamcast combo)

Help Super Mega Ultra Combo Man fulfill his dream! 

Ever since he was a little boy wonder, resident super hero Super Mega Ultra Combo Man (SMUC Man for short) wanted nothing more than live a life without any of that super hero hassle.

At long last, his dream may finally come true: Being from planet Supmegulcom, he can lose his powers by punching a large amount of people! The curtains open on a brand new non-One-Punch-Man-inspired super hero tale!

A brand new Rhythm game swingin' to your Sega Dreamcast in 2017!

Additional notes:

  • Source code is on github: https://github.com/CaptainDreamcast/QuestForNormalcy
  • You can follow me on twitter, if you're into that: https://twitter.com/CaptDreamc...

Thanks for playing!
